channel.title: 3rd on Computer Science - Robotics - Math - Computer Coding - Chess in Charlottesville
channel.description: Recent content in 3rd on Computer Science - Robotics - Math - Computer Coding - Chess in Charlottesville

item.title: Banana Code Quest: Adventures in Text-Based Programming | Blue Ridge Boost
item.description: Banana Code Quest is a gamified coding course designed to teach young students real-world coding from the very first challenge. Through engaging puzzles and adventures, students help a monkey catch bananas and outsmart various animals, all while learning fundamental and advanced coding concepts in a fun and interactive way.

item.title: Girl-Powered TechQuest: Fall Bots & Spring Bricks | Blue Ridge Boost
item.description: This inclusive STEM class is dedicated to empowering girls, while warmly welcoming and encouraging participation from all genders. Scholarships are available to ensure that financial limitations do not prevent students from joining.

item.title: Junior Robotics Adventures: Dino Quests & Lego Explorers | Blue Ridge Boost
item.description: Embark on an exciting year-long journey where young learners explore basic robotics concepts through themed challenges, including Jurassic adventures with Sphero indi in the fall and collaborative Lego robotics projects in the spring, fostering critical thinking, teamwork, and creativity.

item.title: Math Excellence for Third and Fourth Grade| Blue Ridge Boost
Math Leapers: Advanced Kangaroo Challenges | Blue Ridge Boost
item.description: Preparation class for the Kangaroo Math Competition. The Kangaroo Mathematics Competition, set for Thursday, March 20, 2025.

item.title: Math Mastery for Third and Fourth Graders | Blue Ridge Boost
Robotics Discovery for 2nd and 3rd Grades | Blue Ridge Boost
item.description: This class offers a progressive, hands-on introduction to robotics for students in grades 2 and 3, covering Vex GO, Lego Spike Essential, and Sphero Bolt Robotics throughout the academic year, while developing problem-solving, critical thinking, and teamwork skills.

item.title: TechQuest: Fall Bots & Spring Bricks | Blue Ridge Boost
